title: Manage a Product Quality Complaint
description: A pharmacist calls to complain that a batch of tablets appears discolored. A quality specialist must handle the complaint.

tasks.description: Log the product complaint in the quality management system, capturing all details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new complaint record with the product name, lot number, and description of the issue.

tasks.description: Arrange for the complaint sample to be returned from the pharmacy for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a return shipping label and instructions for the pharmacist.

tasks.description: Review the retention samples for the same batch to check for the discoloration issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the retained samples and confirms that the discoloration is also present.

tasks.description: Initiate a formal quality investigation to determine the root cause of the discoloration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent opens a new investigation record and links it to the product complaint.
